title: List of IP LoL uses?
body:
Does anyone have the IP range they use? trying to prioritize my traffic 

Thank

replies.body: For NA, your connection will try and route to 104.160.131.1.  If you're running into any trouble, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help strengthen local issues reaching the game server.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings if you're getting blocked.  I hope that helps!
